main.name: Weihao Ke
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Dean's Honors List - UC Santa Cruz

work.title: Software Engineer ||
work.description: -Implemented, Enhanced features using . NET(Visual Basic, C#), and Core Java/Spring/Apache Camel for Mission Planning Systems to be more resilient, and reusable, such as improved user experience, and created middleware to communicate to different machines to machines. -Developed app integration with REST and other APIs for Internal Services. And resolved Level 3 technical support tickets.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: -Created scripts to aggregate important data utilize Python/Pandas, R dplyr.-Implemented Smartabase platform and RESTful API to build dashboard to meet customer's requirements. Interacted with stakeholders for requirement analysis and to define research and functional specifications.

work.title: Full stack Developer
work.description: -Designed and Developed multiple dynamic RESTful Web Applications for E-commerce which are used for Furniture rental and sale based on Vue.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.-Partner alongside another developer to implement RESTful API in Node.js and MongoDB that enable internal tools for design and sale team to increase speed by 30%

work.title: Front End Engineer Intern
work.description: -Developed web pages for the streaming platform and e-commerce site using React.js and Sass, as well as React Router to handle each page individually.
